title: I need help I got hacked and lost Rp on the Account
body: I submitted a ticket yesterday and it still hasn't been resolved. Today I sent another please when you get the chance to help me out.

replies.body: Hey, sorry our account team might have a higher volume right now.  Sending duplicate tickets can cause delays and confusion, though, so you don't want to do that.  Toss me your original ticket number, I'd be happy to check on the status for you.  Don't worry, our account team can help you out!
